steps.title: Welcome to Dragon Ranch!
steps.body: Welcome, new dragon breeder! You've inherited a small ranch where you'll breed dragons to fulfill customer orders. Click 'Next' to begin your tutorial.

steps.title: Meet Your Starter Dragons
steps.body: These are your first two dragons! Click on any dragon to view its details, including its genetic traits. Try clicking on a dragon now.

steps.title: Time to Breed!
steps.body: To fulfill orders, you'll need to breed dragons with specific traits. Click the 'Breeding' button to open the breeding panel.

steps.title: Select Breeding Pair
steps.body: Choose two adult dragons to breed. Their offspring will inherit traits from both parents following genetic rules. Select both parent slots now.

steps.title: Create Your First Egg
steps.body: Great! Now click the 'Breed' button to create an egg. The egg will inherit genetic traits from both parents according to Mendelian inheritance.

steps.title: Time Passes in Seasons
steps.body: Your egg needs time to hatch. Time in Dragon Ranch progresses by seasons. Click the 'Advance Season' button to move time forward.

steps.title: Your Dragon Hatches!
steps.body: Continue advancing seasons until your egg hatches into a hatchling, then grows into an adult dragon. Adult dragons can be sold to fulfill orders.

steps.title: Check Customer Orders
steps.body: Customers place orders for dragons with specific traits. Click the 'Orders' button to see available orders.

steps.title: Fulfill Your First Order
steps.body: Select an order and choose a dragon that matches the requirements. Fulfilling orders earns you money to expand your ranch!

steps.title: Expand Your Ranch
steps.body: Use your earnings to buy new facilities! Click the 'Build' button to see what you can purchase. Facilities increase your capacity and unlock new features.

steps.title: Tutorial Complete!
steps.body: Congratulations! You've learned the basics of running a dragon ranch. Continue breeding dragons, fulfilling orders, and expanding your facilities. Understanding genetics will help you breed better dragons faster. Good luck!

steps.title: New Trait Unlocked: Color!
steps.body:
You've reached reputation level 1! The Color trait is now unlocked. Dragons can now have Red (RR), Pink (RW), or White (WW) scales.

Color uses incomplete dominance: breeding RR × WW always produces Pink (RW) offspring, not pure Red or White!

steps.title: Breeding with Incomplete Dominance
steps.body:
Unlike simple dominance (Fire, Wings, Armor), Color follows incomplete dominance:
• RR × RR = 100% Red (RR)
• RR × WW = 100% Pink (RW)
• RW × RW = 25% Red (RR), 50% Pink (RW), 25% White (WW)

Open the Breeding panel to see color predictions.

steps.title: Customers Want Colored Dragons!
steps.body: Now that Color is unlocked, customers will start requesting dragons of specific colors. Try breeding a Pink dragon (RW) by crossing Red (RR) and White (WW) parents. Check the Orders panel for color-based orders!
